alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 7:12PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Collier County through 745 PM EDT... At 712 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Royal Palm Hammock, or 12 miles southeast of Golden Gate Estates, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marco Island, Golden Gate Estates, Marco Island Airport, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Royal Palm Hammock, South Blocks Golde, Picayune Strand State Forest, Port Of The Island, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd and Goodland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
